meanings.definition: A small body of still water, typically man-made.
meanings.sent1: The ducks swam in the pond.
meanings.sent2: The children played by the pond.
meanings.sent3: The pond looked like a mirror reflecting the sky.
meanings.sent4: The pond was a tranquil oasis in the middle of the park.
meanings.sent5: The pond shimmered in the sunlight, inviting all to its calm waters.
